title: An Act providing for a study to be conducted on the cost feasibility of implementing a ferry service to Long Island in Boston Harbor

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Ayers of Quincy, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3615) of Bruce J. Ayers for an investigation by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to the cost of implementing a ferry service to Long Island in Boston Harbor.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Transportation
Hearing scheduled for 10/21/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-2
